pre_text_caption_evidence: part ii , item 7 in 2006 , cash provided by financing activities was $ 291 million which was primarily due to the proceeds from employee stock plans ( $ 442 million ) and an increase in debt of $ 1.5 billion partially offset by the repurchase of 17.99 million shares of schlumberger stock ( $ 1.07 billion ) and the payment of dividends to shareholders ( $ 568 million ) .

schlumberger believes that at december 31 , 2006 , cash and short-term investments of $ 3.0 billion and available and unused credit facilities of $ 2.2 billion are sufficient to meet future business requirements for at least the next twelve months .
summary of major contractual commitments ( stated in millions ) .
